channel.title: Item on Item = Tele
channel.description:
Hi,
Iv been makeing my own Quest and i need to know to to make it so if i use on item o an item OR an item on an object then it makes u tele
( or u could help me by telling me how to make so u need an item on to use a portal :| )
Would be verry helpfull and would help me a LOT!
Thanks.
EDIT: OH and im useing satans isle ~soalreaver~

item.title: Item on Item = Tele
item.dc:creator: @Raze Raze
item.description:
@Raze wrote:

else if(useItemID == 449 && atObjectID == 2781 || atObjectID == 11666)) { randommage1(); }

Should work

item.title: Item on Item = Tele
item.dc:creator: @Devil_Cry Devil Cry
item.description:
@Devil_Cry wrote:

AAAgh kool tnx

if i wanted to do like a random outcome would id o this ??

else if(useItemID == ID && (atObjectID == ID || atObjectID == ID)) { randommage1(); }

(random code edited from my client javs )

(mage 1 is my drops )

Read full topic

item.title: Item on Item = Tele
item.dc:creator: @Raze Raze
item.description:
@Raze wrote:

Search

else if(useItemID == 2363 && atObjectID == 2783)//rune { initSmithing(2363); flushOutStream(); }

under it

else if(useItemID == itemid && atObjectID == objectid) { teleportToX = 1337; teleportToY = 1337; }

Hope ive helped you out

Read full topic
